example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-TMP (NOUN لدى) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN دهم) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN عناصر)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN قوى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامن) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الداخلي))))) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC المكان))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP فرّوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_INDEF_ACC جميعاً))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: elements of the internal security forces
